name: rfs
description: Powerfull & easy-to-use responsive font sizing system.

scripts.gulp-examples: cd examples/less/gulp && gulp build && cd ../../postcss/gulp && gulp build && cd ../../sass/gulp && gulp build && cd ../../scss/gulp && gulp build && cd ../../stylus/gulp && gulp build && cd ../../../..
scripts.node-examples: node examples/less/node/index.js && node examples/postcss/node/index.js && node examples/sass/node/index.js && node examples/scss/node/index.js && node examples/stylus/node/index.js

author: Martijn Cuppens <martijn.cuppens@gmail.com>
